name: Kipp Stewart for Directional Lounge Chairs in Jack Lenor Larsen Velvet

condition.details: Additions or alterations made to the original: We replaced the foam and batting in the seat cushions as well as replace the seat straps. Wear consistent with age and use. Solid mahogany bases have ben cleaned and conditioned. Brass casters show a warm perfectly aged light patina. All original Jack Lenor Larsen velvet is in extraordinarily good condition - the chairs look to have been hardily, if ever used.

specifications.rawSpecificationsHTML: Exceptional and rare pair of barrel back lounge chairs by Kipp Stewart for Directional with all original Jack Lenor Larsen velvet. Solid dark mahogany bases with brass casters. An elegant and modern silhouette lends to a multitude of design esthetics. Attended to by our team of in-house craftspeople - these chairs are ready for installation. Solid mahogany bases have been cleaned and conditioned. Brass casters show a warm perfectly aged light patina. All original Jack Lenor Larsen velvet is in extraordinarily good condition - the chairs look to have been hardily, if ever used. We did replace the foam and batting in the seat cushions as well as replace the seat straps. Measures: W28" x D28" x H26" (seat H16").

Exceptional and rare pair of barrel back lounge chairs by Kipp Stewart for Directional with all original Jack Lenor Larsen velvet. Solid dark mahogany bases with brass casters. An elegant and modern silhouette lends to a multitude of design esthetics. Attended to by our team of in-house craftspeople - these chairs are ready for installation. Solid mahogany bases have been cleaned and conditioned. Brass casters show a warm perfectly aged light patina. All original Jack Lenor Larsen velvet is in extraordinarily good condition - the chairs look to have been hardily, if ever used. We did replace the foam and batting in the seat cushions as well as replace the seat straps.

Measures: W28" x D28" x H26" (seat H16").
